trans-unit.source: Enables debugging and help information features for a [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] service.
trans-unit.target: Aktiverer funksjoner for feilsøking og hjelp informasjon for en [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The constructor creates a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> object with the following defaults: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> property is `false`.
trans-unit.target: Konstruktøren oppretter en <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>objekt med følgende standarder: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A>egenskapen `false`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A>Egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A>Egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A> property is the base address of the service that supports HTTP requests.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A>Egenskapen er basisadressen til tjenesten som støtter HTTP-forespørsler.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> is the base address of the service that supports HTTPS requests.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>Er basisadressen til tjenesten som støtter HTTPS-forespørsler.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets high-level access to the definition of a binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilgang på høyt nivå i definisjonen av en binding.

trans-unit.source: A channel binding.
trans-unit.target: En kanal-binding.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that controls whether [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publishes an HTML help page at the address controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som bestemmer om [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publiserer en HTML-hjelp-side med adressen kontrolleres av de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl*>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: Set the HttpHelpPageEnabled property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen HttpHelpPageEnabled `false` å deaktivere publiseringen av en HTML hjelp-siden vises HTML nettlesere.

trans-unit.source: To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, you must set this property to `true` and then one of the following conditions must also be true: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property is an absolute address that supports the HTTP protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: Slik at HTML-hjelp siden er publisert på plasseringen kontrolleres av de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>, må du sette denne egenskapen `true` og deretter én av følgende betingelser må også være til stede: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>egenskapen er en absolutt adresse som støtter skjemaet for HTTP-protokollen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTP protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: -Det er en basisadressen for tjenesten som støtter HTTP-Protokollskjemaet.

trans-unit.source: Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTP protocol scheme is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.
trans-unit.target: Selv om et unntak hvis en absolutt adresse som ikke støtter HTTP-Protokollskjemaet er tilordnet til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>for hjelp-egenskapen, andre scenario som verken foregående vilkår er met fører ingen unntak og ingen HTML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publishes an HTML help page; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] publiserer en HTML-hjelp-siden; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location at which the HTML help file is published.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen HTML hjelpefilen publiseres.

trans-unit.source: Use the HttpHelpPageUrl property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTP/Get request such as that of an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HttpHelpPageUrl-egenskapen til å aktivere bruken av en egendefinert HTML-hjelpefilen som er returnert fra en HTTP/Get-forespørsel for eksempel som i en HTML-webleseren.

trans-unit.source: The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows: - If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTP requests plus this property value.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av hjelpefilen HTML er løst som følger: - Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen er en relativ adresse er plasseringen av hjelpefilen HTML verdien for tjenesten basisadressen som støtter HTTP-forespørsler pluss verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTP requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen er en absolutt adresse og støtter HTTP-forespørsler er plasseringen av hjelpefilen HTML verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTP requests, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen er absolutt, men støtter ikke HTTP-forespørsler som er det et unntaket.

trans-unit.source: This property is applied only in the case that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare i tilfelle som den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpHelpPageEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute HTTP-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: Relativ eller absolutt HTTP-baserte URL-adresse for den egendefinerte HTMLEN hjelpefilen som brukeren ser når endepunktet åpnes i et HTML-leseren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets high-level access to the definition of a binding.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir tilgang på høyt nivå i definisjonen av en binding.

trans-unit.source: A channel binding.
trans-unit.target: En kanal-binding.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returns an HTML help file over HTTPS at the address controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl*> property.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returnerer en HTML-hjelpefilen over HTTPS på adressen kontrolleres av de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl*>egenskapen.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl*>

trans-unit.source: Set the HttpsHelpPageEnabled property to `false` to disable the publication of an HTML help page visible to HTML browsers.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen HttpsHelpPageEnabled `false` å deaktivere publiseringen av en HTML hjelp-siden vises HTML nettlesere.

trans-unit.source: To ensure the HTML help page is published at the location controlled by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, you must set this property to `true` and then one of the following conditions must also be true: - The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property is an absolute address that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: Slik at HTML-hjelp siden er publisert på plasseringen kontrolleres av de <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>, må du sette denne egenskapen `true` og deretter én av følgende betingelser må også være til stede: - <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>egenskapen er en absolutt adresse som støtter HTTPS-protokollen-skjema.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> </xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: - There is a base address for the service that supports the HTTPS protocol scheme.
trans-unit.target: -Det er en basisadressen for tjenesten som støtter HTTPS-protokollen-skjema.

trans-unit.source: Although an exception is thrown if an absolute address that does not support the HTTPS protocol scheme is assigned to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A> property, any other scenario in which neither of the preceding criteria is met results in no exception and no HTML help page.
trans-unit.target: Selv om et unntak hvis en absolutt adresse som ikke støtter HTTPS-protokollen-skjema er knyttet til den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>for hjelp-egenskapen, andre scenario som verken foregående vilkår er met fører ingen unntak og ingen HTML.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageUrl%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if an HTML help file is returned to clients making an HTTPS/GET request such as that of an HTML browser; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis en HTML-hjelpefilen returneres til klienter som en HTTPS/GET-forespørsel for eksempel til en HTML-leseren. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the location at which an HTML file is published for retrieval using HTTPS.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir plasseringen en HTML-fil er publisert for henting av bruker HTTPS.

trans-unit.source: Use the HttpsHelpPageUrl property to enable the use of a custom HTML help file that is returned from an HTTPS/Get request such as that of an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: Bruk HttpsHelpPageUrl-egenskapen til å aktivere bruken av en egendefinert HTML-hjelpefilen som er returnert fra en HTTPS/Get-forespørsel for eksempel som i en HTML-webleseren.

trans-unit.source: The location of the HTML help file is resolved as follows: - If the value of this property is a relative address, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of the service base address that supports HTTPS requests plus this property value.
trans-unit.target: Plasseringen av hjelpefilen HTML er løst som følger: - Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen er en relativ adresse er plasseringen av hjelpefilen HTML verdien for tjenesten basisadressen som støtter HTTPS-forespørsler pluss verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - If the value of this property is an absolute address and supports HTTPS requests, then the location of the HTML help file is the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen er en absolutt adresse og støtter HTTPS-forespørsler er plasseringen av hjelpefilen HTML verdien for denne egenskapen.

trans-unit.source: - If the value of this property is absolute but does not support HTTPS requests, an exception is thrown.
trans-unit.target: -Hvis verdien for denne egenskapen er absolutt, men ikke støtter HTTPS-forespørsler er det et unntak som er registrert.

trans-unit.source: This property is applied only in the case that the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A> property is `true`.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen brukes bare i tilfelle som den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A>egenskapen `true`.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior.HttpsHelpPageEnabled%2A>

trans-unit.source: The relative or absolute HTTPS-based URL of the custom HTML help file that the user sees when the endpoint is viewed using an HTML browser.
trans-unit.target: Relativ eller absolutt HTTPS-baserte URL-adresse for den egendefinerte HTMLEN hjelpefilen som brukeren ser når endepunktet åpnes i et HTML-leseren.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to include managed exception information in the detail of SOAP faults returned to the client for debugging purposes.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om du vil inkludere styrt unntaksinformasjon i detaljer om SOAP-feil som returneres til klienten for feilsøkingsformål.

trans-unit.source: Set the IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults property to `true` to instruct [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] to return managed exception information to the client in SOAP faults to ease debugging.
trans-unit.target: Angi egenskapen IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults `true` å angi [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] til å returnere forvaltet unntaksinformasjon til klienten i SOAP-feil for å forenkle feilsøking.

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > Returning managed exception information to clients can be a security risk because exception details expose information about the internal service implementation that could be used by unauthorized clients.
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > Returnerer styrt unntaksinformasjon til klienter kan være en sikkerhetsrisiko fordi unntaksdetaljer vise informasjon om intern service implementeringen som kan brukes av uautorisert klienter.

trans-unit.source: In addition, although the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior> properties can also be set programmatically, it can be easy to forget to disable IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults when deploying.
trans-unit.target: I tillegg selv om den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>Egenskaper kan også angis programmatisk, kan det være lett å huske å deaktivere IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults når du distribuerer.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.ServiceDebugBehavior>

trans-unit.source: Because of the security issues involved, it is strongly recommended that: - You use an application configuration file to set the value of the IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: På grunn av sikkerhetsproblemer involvert anbefales som:-du bruke en konfigurasjonsfil for programmet til å angi verdien for egenskapen IncludeExceptionDetailInFaults til `true`.

trans-unit.source: - You only do so only in controlled debugging scenarios.
trans-unit.target: -Du bare gjøre slik at bare i kontrolleres feilsøking scenarier.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] [Specifying and Handling Faults in Contracts and Services](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)][Angivelse av som behandler feil i kontrakter og tjenester](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returns managed exception information in the SOAP faults for client debugging purposes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] returnerer styrt unntaksinformasjon i SOAP-feil for klienten feilsøkingsformål; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metode for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: Modifies the bindings to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Endrer bindinger for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[crdefault](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>metoden.</xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.AddBindingParameters%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: The endpoints for the service.
trans-unit.target: Endepunkter for tjenesten.

trans-unit.source: The binding parameters that support modifying the bindings.
trans-unit.target: Bindingsparameterne som støtter å endre bindingene.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.ApplyDispatchBehavior%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metode for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.

trans-unit.source: Implements the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to support the behavior.
trans-unit.target: Implementerer den <xref:System.ServiceModel.Description.IServiceBehavior.Validate%2A?displayProperty=fullName> metode for å støtte virkemåten.

trans-unit.source: The service description.
trans-unit.target: Tjenestebeskrivelsen.

trans-unit.source: The service host.
trans-unit.target: Tjenesteverten.
